name: Magnetic
description:
In this puzzler, you play as a magnet and must use your attract and repel abilities to move objects, clear threats, and unlock portals. Think ahead, as one wrong move could have you literally bringing the danger towards you.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  • Hold Left Mouse Button or Spacebar to attract
  • Release Left Mouse Button  or Spacebar  to repel
  • ESC for in-game menu

Collaborators:

  • @ProdigalSon: Lead Programmer
  • @Drums: Graphics, Sound, and Level Designer  
  • Special Thanks to Jesse P. for Music
